technology.description: Multi-platform privacy-focused DeFi wallet supporting Mac, Windows, Linux, web, iOS, and Android, integrated with RAILGUN Smart Contract Privacy System for zkSNARK-based transaction privacy

sources_summary.cross_verification_note: All critical facts verified across 2+ independent sources per constitutional requirements
sources_summary.verification_methodology: Primary source verification via official channels, secondary verification via press releases and ecosystem documentation

overall_assessment.data_quality: High quality. Comprehensive privacy features documented, extensive RAILGUN audit history, active development, strong multi-source verification across 17+ sources.
overall_assessment.verification_method: Multi-source verification from GitHub API (4 endpoints), official website, documentation, RAILGUN ecosystem, press releases (2), app stores (2), and social media (3 platforms)
key_findings: Production-ready multi-platform wallet with 6 platform support
Strong privacy foundation through RAILGUN zkSNARK integration
Extensive protocol audit history (5 major security firms)
Compliance-ready with Proof of Innocence features
limitations: No Railway Wallet-specific application audit (RAILGUN protocol audited extensively)
Limited public team member information (1 visible contributor)
No specific funding round details disclosed
User metrics (active users, TVL) not publicly available
strengths: Active development (last push August 2025, repository created 2024-01-11)
Open source under AGPL-3.0 for independent verification
Multi-platform support (6 platforms: Mac, Windows, Linux, web, iOS, Android)
Foundation-backed (Right to Privacy Foundation) for sustainability
Extensive RAILGUN protocol audits (5 firms: Trail of Bits, ABDK, Zokyo 100/100, Hacken, Hashcloak)
zkSNARK privacy technology with battle-tested RAILGUN integration
Endorsed by Vitalik Buterin (used publicly in 2024 and 2025)
Comprehensive privacy features: shielding, private DeFi, zero logging, local-only storage
Active community (2046 Twitter followers, Telegram group)
Compliance features (Proof of Innocence, tax reporting)
Available on major app stores (Google Play, Apple App Store)
Clear privacy value proposition with compliance balance
risks_and_concerns: Limited team transparency (privacy vs. accountability tradeoff)
No wallet-specific security audit (relies on RAILGUN protocol audits)
Proof of Innocence vulnerability research ongoing (ZachXBT findings)
Small visible community compared to major wallet competitors

competitive_position.differentiation: Multi-chain zkSNARK privacy with DeFi integration and compliance features

overall_assessment.recommendation: Strong privacy-focused wallet with solid technical foundation and extensive protocol audits. Primary gaps are team transparency and wallet-specific security audit. Suitable for privacy-conscious users who trust the RAILGUN protocol audits and foundation governance model. Would benefit from independent application audit and increased team transparency.

description: Railway Wallet is a private DeFi wallet powered by RAILGUN's zkSNARK privacy system, enabling completely untraceable ERC-20 token transactions across Ethereum, Arbitrum, Polygon, BSC, and additional chains. The wallet allows users to shield tokens for transaction privacy, interact with public DeFi platforms (swaps, yield, liquidity) from private 0zk addresses, and maintains local-only encrypted storage with zero activity logging. Compliance features include Viewing Keys, Private Proofs of Innocence (Privacy Pools), and tax reporting, available on desktop, iOS, and Android platforms.

project_description: Railway Wallet is a private DeFi wallet powered by RAILGUN's zkSNARK privacy system, enabling completely untraceable ERC-20 token transactions across Ethereum, Arbitrum, Polygon, BSC, and additional chains. The wallet allows users to shield tokens for transaction privacy, interact with public DeFi platforms (swaps, yield, liquidity) from private 0zk addresses, and maintains local-only encrypted storage with zero activity logging. Compliance features include Viewing Keys, Private Proofs of Innocence (Privacy Pools), and tax reporting, available on desktop, iOS, and Android platforms.
